app.title: Handy
app.subtitle: Free, offline, open source speech-to-text tool

accessibility.message: Please grant accessibility permissions for Handy

language_setup.title: Welcome to Handy
language_setup.description: Choose your preferred language to continue
language_setup.can_change_later: You can change this later in the settings

languages.title: Interface language
languages.description: Choose which language Handy uses for its interface.

start_hidden.label: Launch to menu bar
start_hidden.description: Start Handy in the menu bar without opening the main window.

autostart.label: Start at login
autostart.description: Launch Handy automatically when you log into your computer.

overlay_position.label: Overlay position
overlay_position.description: Choose where the recording overlay appears on your screen.

translate_to_english.label: Translate transcriptions to English
translate_to_english.description: Automatically translate recognized speech into English when available.

model_unload.title: Unload model
model_unload.description: Free memory after Handy has been idle for the selected duration.

custom_words.title: Custom words
custom_words.description: Add or edit words that Handy should always recognize and correct automatically.

language.title: Language
language.description: Select the language for speech recognition. Auto will automatically determine the language, while selecting a specific language can improve accuracy for that language.
language.unsupported_description: Parakeet model automatically detects the language. No manual selection is needed.

microphone.title: Microphone
microphone.description: Select the input device Handy should use for recording.

output_device.title: Output device
output_device.description: Select the audio output device used for Handy's feedback sounds.

push_to_talk.label: Push to talk
push_to_talk.description: Hold the shortcut to record, release to stop.

audio_feedback.label: Audio feedback
audio_feedback.description: Play a sound when recording starts and stops.

volume.label: Volume
volume.description: Adjust the volume of Handy's audio feedback.

whisper.title: Whisper.cpp
whisper.description: High-performance inference of OpenAI's Whisper automatic speech recognition model
whisper.body: Handy uses Whisper.cpp for fast, local speech-to-text processing. Thanks to the amazing work by Georgi Gerganov and contributors.

app_data_directory.label: App data directory
app_data_directory.description: Primary folder where Handy stores data, settings, and downloaded models.

history.empty: No transcriptions yet. Start recording to build your history!

errors.delete_failed: Failed to delete entry. Please try again.

paste_method.title: Paste method
paste_method.description: Clipboard (Ctrl/Cmd+V) pastes by simulating the keyboard shortcut. Direct uses system input methods when possible, otherwise it types characters one by one.

clipboard_handling.title: Clipboard handling
clipboard_handling.description: Choose how Handy manages your clipboard after a transcription is pasted.

sound_picker.title: Sound theme
sound_picker.description: Select the sounds played when recording starts and stops.
sound_picker.preview: Preview sound theme (plays start then stop)

word_correction_threshold.label: Word correction threshold
word_correction_threshold.description: Controls how aggressively custom words are applied. Lower values mean fewer corrections; higher values mean more corrections. Range: 0 (least aggressive) to 1 (most aggressive).

history_limit.title: History limit
history_limit.description: Maximum number of transcription entries to keep in history.

autostart.label: Launch on startup
autostart.description: Automatically start Handy when you log into your computer.

start_hidden.label: Start hidden
start_hidden.description: Launch Handy to the system tray without opening the window.

custom_words.title: Custom words
custom_words.description: Add words that Handy should recognize and correct automatically during transcription.

translate_to_english.label: Translate to English
translate_to_english.description: Automatically translate speech from other languages to English during transcription.
translate_to_english.unsupported: Translation is not supported by the {{model}} model.

model_unload_timeout.title: Unload model
model_unload_timeout.description: Automatically free GPU/CPU memory when the model hasn't been used for the specified time.

always_on_microphone.label: Always-on microphone
always_on_microphone.description: Keep the microphone active for low-latency recording. This may prevent your computer from sleeping.

mute_while_recording.label: Mute while recording
mute_while_recording.description: Automatically mute system sound output during recording and restore it afterwards.

paths.title: Debug paths
paths.description: Display key directories Handy uses for debugging purposes.
